Package org.jsfml.graphics

Class Color

java.lang.Object
org.jsfml.graphics.Color
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class Color extends Object implements Serializable
Represents RGBA colors.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • Color

      public Color(int r, int g, int b)
      Constructs a new color with the specified color components and an alpha value of 255 (fully opaque).
      Parameters:
      r - the color's red component.
      g - the color's green component.
      b - the color's blue component.

    • Color

      public Color(int r, int g, int b, int a)
      Constructs a new color with the specified color and alpha components.
      Parameters:
      r - the color's red component.
      g - the color's green component.
      b - the color's blue component.
      a - the color's alpha component, ranging between 0 (transparent) and 255 (fully opaque).

    • Color

      public Color(Color color, int alpha)
      Constructs a new color by copying another color and resetting the alpha value.
      Parameters:
      color - the color to copy.
      alpha - the alpha value of the new color, ranging between 0 (transparent) and 255 (fully opaque).

  • Method Details

    • add

      public static Color add(Color a, Color b)
      Modulates two colors by performing a component-wise addition.
      Parameters:
      a - the first color.
      b - the second color.
      Returns:
      the modulated color.

      public static Color mul(Color a, Color b)
      Modulates two colors by performing a component-wise multiplication.
      Parameters:
      a - the first color.
      b - the second color.
      Returns:
      the modulated color.

      Modulates a color by multiplying its components with a factor.
      Parameters:

      f - the factor.
      Returns:
      the modulated color.
